amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 116-411 to require GAO to study rates of pay for Transportation Security Administration employees with duty stations in the territories, Alaska, and Hawaii with those in the contiguous 48 states based on pay systems.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 116-411 to require GAO to study rates of pay for Transportation Security Administration employees with duty stations in the territories, Alaska, and Hawaii with those in the contiguous 48 states based on pay systems.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rogers (AL) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rogers (AL) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Rogers (AL).
